item.title: Getting values from a form containing combos in Ext
item.description: Actually it is pretty easy to get the values of all fields of a form in Ext: You just have to call the getValues() method of the BasicForm. The problem with that approach is that it just takes the values directly from the DOM and is not calling the getValue() for each field (Which I assumed). One consequence is that you don’t get the values of combo boxes, but their labels.
